body.name: Samsung Galaxy S21+ 5G Phantom Violet (Renewed)

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Pre-owned Certified: Electronics products are inspected, cleaned and (if applicable) repaired to excellent functional standards. Buying Pre-owned extends a product's life, reducing e-waste and raw material extraction.

features: 6.7", 1080 x 2400 pixels, Dynamic AMOLED 2X, 120Hz, HDR10+, 1300nits, 4800mAh Battery
128GB ROM, 8GB RAM, No SD Card Slot, Qualcomm SM8350 Snapdragon 888 5G (5 nm), Octa-Core, Adreno 660.
Rear Camera: 64MP, f/2.0 + 12MP, f/1.8 + 12MP, f/2.2, Front Camera: 10 MP, f/2.2, Android 11, One UI 3.1
Compatible with Most GSM and CDMA Carriers like T-Mobile, AT&T, MetroPCS, etc. Will Also work with CDMA Carriers Such as Verizon, Sprint
body.description: Embark on a journey of innovation with the Samsung Galaxy S21+ 5G SM-G996U – a symphony of cutting-edge technology and style. Immerse yourself in a visual masterpiece on its expansive display, where vibrant details burst forth in every frame. Capture life's magic with precision through the advanced camera system, turning ordinary moments into extraordinary memories. Fueled by a powerful processor, this device ensures a seamless and responsive performance, tailored to your dynamic lifestyle. With a robust battery, it keeps you connected throughout your day, while intuitive features enhance your daily tasks. Elevate your experience within the Samsung ecosystem, where a sleek and resilient companion awaits – not just a phone, but a testament to Samsung's commitment to redefine your mobile journey. Unleash the extraordinary with the Samsung Galaxy S21+ 5G SM-G996U, where style, innovation, and performance converge in a captivating blend. Our carefully inspected and tested Manufacturer refurbished products assure full functionality, having undergone a comprehensive examination. While they may exhibit signs of light to moderate usage, each unit is certified as functional by Phonecheck, an industry-certified, leading stringent quality control and diagnostics examination. Moreover, our commitment to quality extends to a thorough cleaning process. Please note that each shipment may arrive in a brown or white generic box, accompanied by relevant charging accessories (please be aware that headphones are not included), which may also be generic. Our top priority throughout this refurbishment process is your reliable performance and quality assurance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Everything looks and works great!
reviews.reviewText: This is the second device I bought. As it is renewed, it is heavily discounted. Everything is much better than you can expect from a 220-dollar phone: incredible camera (I had an s21 ultra before, and the pictures are almost the same if zoom is not that important to you), 120 hz display is buttery smooth, excellent speed, and most importantly fantastic battery life. It is probably the best value phone in the market. You will have a premium experience with an entry-level price tag. If used or renewed does not bother you much, go for it, you will not regret it. And as Amazon allows a 90-day return policy, you can rest assured.Extra note: avoid buying from GreenTech Refurbished, the first one I bought from them, it was cosmetically very poor with super deep scratches on the screen even sometimes visible while the screen is onMANY THANKS, Seller Cellmigo, they are amazing, sent me almost like a new product even though I ordered good condition. So buy from them if available

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great phone for the price
reviews.reviewText: Arrived a day later than scheduled but it's not the seller's fault. Overall the phone is very good and is in a great condition. I'll definitely buy from them again. Thank you

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars As described...pleased with phone
reviews.reviewText: Bought an excellent condition renewed S21+ through the seller "Chubbiestech". Phone arrived as described: screen was perfect as was the glass back. There are a few minor nicks along the side edge near camera area which were not really noticeable from 12 inches away (Amazon describes "excellent" as having no signs of cosmetic damage (scratches, dents, and other) visible when held 12 inches away).Phone works great, battery life is good...all in all I'm pleased with the purchase. Thanks!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Overall good phone.
reviews.reviewText: Phone arrived a day sooner than expected. Seller used overnight shipping from fedex. Camera quality is amazing! Definitely my favorite part of the phone. Battery life isn't great. I usually have to charge it in the afternoon. Body has some pretty sever scuffs. Looks like it was dropped pretty hard on concrete There was a sticker covering the damage, but once removed it is very obvious. And screen has some deep scratches. Wouldn't say the body is in excellent condition, but operation on the phone is. Charger that came with phone works very well, not a Samsung charger though, I'm okay with it. Takes the phone roughly 2 and a half hours to fully charge. Switched from an iPhone 11 pro max, and wow is this phone an upgrade! I selected the sliver color, but received the purple. Doesn't matter to me because it will always have a case on it. Phone was fully unlocked and I had no issues connecting it to cricket.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect condition at a great price
reviews.reviewText: I dropped and broke my s22 ultra and was needing a phone asap cause I was about to travel. I looked around town at local sellers but they all wanted outrageous prices, and you never really know what you're gonna yet. Especially where I live. I decided to check Amazon renewed phones just for my trip and I'm glad I did. This phone came in faster than I could get my s22 ultra replaced, and was in perfect condition when it arrived. Not a single scratch on it. The battery life was still good, and didn't drain quickly. It was also factory unlocked like it said, so I popped my sim in (xfinity mobile) and it worked perfectly. It even had the xfinity loading screen now at the beginning. I guess I got the luck of the draw compared to some of the comments on here. I have zero complaints. I just got my new s22 ultra back today, but I haven't transfered anything or swapped it back. I'm thinking I'm just gonna roll with this one for now, and keep my ultra for backup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Defective Item - Seller refuses to refund/exchange
reviews.reviewText: I bought this product which is expensive thinking that it would work, however after receiving it, I have been having nonstop problems with the battery malfunctioning. I did have a warranty of 90 days, however I didn't know the extreme of the condition of the phone until later on. I noticed that the battery would drain fast, the device couldn't hold a charge, charged very slow and I always have to be around a charger just to use the device. The seller claims that the battery has a certain capacity but when i go into my battery setting it tells me that my battery has more power than the advertised power the seller claims - but why is my device malfunctioning the way it is? Because it's defective. If I had known what I know now I wouldn't have tried solving the problem and I would've returned it within the time-frame required. I tried everything to solve this issue such as trying all different types of chargers with different watts and I've tried all different types of charging wall ports... device when not in use for less than 10 minutes drops over 10%. I'm very upset with this purchase and the lost of my money into a defective item that barely works. I don't have much income at all so this is really frustrating. The seller is not compassionate and doesn't care about my concerns. I have asked respectfully for a refund or exchange, however seller wants to enforce their warranty policy instead of making a customer satisfied. I RECOMMEND THAT YOU DO NOT PURCHASE FROM THIS SELLER!!!!!!!!! SHADY BUSINESS!!!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought my phone from the seller Deals Always. I know multiple sellers sell these phones and you never know what quality you'll get from which seller but my phone was in perfect condition from this seller and if I ever repurchase one I will look for them specifically! Shipped fast and had absolutely nothing wrong with it. No scratches, great camera, and great sound and love everything about it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best Smartphone for this price
reviews.reviewText: I was very doubtful if buying a refurbished phone, because I never had one before, but I took the risks and decided to do it, and now I'm very grateful I did. The shipping was really fast, arriving on the next laboral day after I ordered it, and now that I have had it for a week, I have no complaints, beyond I had to buy a charger because the one I had before was charging very slow the phone, and the one in the box was not good as well. Beside that, everything is perfect, it had just one little scratch that's almost imperceptible, the camera is amazing, the ram and the processor is super fast, the screen is perfect, the battery lasts all day and it came fully unlocked, even I can use it in Colombia. Probably the best decision I made buying a phone.
